always_apply: Always load and obey policies/SECURITY_POLICY.yaml, policies/CODE_QUALITY.yaml, policies/FILE_PROTECTION.yaml before editing or generating code.
Never delete/rename/commit any .env* files; use .env.example for templates.
Internet features must respect OFFLINE mode and network allowlist from SECURITY_POLICY.yaml.
Skip means DIAGNOSE, not CANCEL. Always load and obey policies/INTERACTION_POLICY.yaml
Never delete/rename any file listed in policies/FILE_PROTECTION.yaml
Always check FILE_PROTECTION policy before modifying .env files
All entrypoints must load runtime/policy_loader.py on startup
Code must pass linting and formatting checks defined in CODE_QUALITY.yaml
Security policy violations must be logged and blocked
PII and sensitive data must be redacted from logs
